name: AR Darts Minigames
description:
A fun  AR party game with 2 minigames:

You can either play darts together to see who scores the highest!

Or you can all compete in a game to see who can pop the most balloons.

How to play darts?

First, scan a wall until you see white dot indicators, and position the center of your screen until you see a black indicator. Tap the screen to place the virtual dart board. Top throw darts, simply tap on the dart

How to Play Balloons?

First, move to the center of the room to ensure that you have enough space. After starting the game, look around to find balloons and shoot darts to get points. Red balloons give 1 point, Blue balloons give 3 and Green balloons give 5.
